client_description_Summary_Note:
Monika Hannah Bauer and the RM met at a financial seminar in Vienna. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Monika Hannah Bauer is a 24 year old and comes from Austria.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Monika Hannah Bauer is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Monika received her secondary school diploma from BRG/BORG Marchfeldstraße in 2019.
Monika graduated from Danube Private University Krems in 2025, completing her higher education.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Monika Hannah Bauer is a 24 year old and comes from Austria.
Monika Hannah Bauer did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 1840000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2016.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Monika achieve financial success and security as she embarks on her professional journey.
